title: CodeAcademy
description: Interactive courses and tutorials to learn programming languages like Python, JavaScript, and more.

title: Coursera
description: Online courses and certifications on topics like data science, business, and more from top universities.

title: FreeCodeCamp
description: Self-paced coding tutorials and challenges to learn web development and prepare for developer interviews.

title: EDX
description: Free online courses from Harvard, MIT, and other top institutions to advance your skills.

title: DataCamp
description: Interactive courses and tutorials on data science, analytics, machine learning, and more.

title: Khan Academy
description: Free online courses, lessons, and practice for K-12 and college students in math, science, computer programming, history, and more.

title: Treehouse
description: Affordable video courses on web design, coding, business, and much more to help build in-demand skills.

title: Udacity
description: Develop in-demand tech skills with Nanodegree programs in areas like AI, cloud, autonomous systems, and more.

title: Skillshare
description: Online classes covering dozens of creative and entrepreneurial skills like illustration, writing, marketing, and more.

title: Udemy
description: Choose from over 155,000 online video courses taught by industry experts on programming, design, marketing, and more.

title: edX Projects
description: Put your skills into practice by completing a project in areas like programming, data science, cybersecurity, and more.

title: CodeStudio
description: Fun, game-like environment to learn computer science and programming concepts like Javascript, HTML/CSS, and more.

title: Google Digital Garage
description: Free online training modules and courses on digital skills like social media, email marketing, data analytics, and more.

title: Career Karma
description: Matches coding bootcamp students with mentors and funders to help launch new careers in areas like web development and UX Design.

title: Coursolve
description: Paid online learning platform focused specifically on developer and IT courses around trending and in-demand technologies.
